i18n_text1: 1.The Rank counts the sum of the charm of the gifts received in the family room, 1 gold coin = 1 charm.
i18n_text2: 2.The top five families on the daily Rank will get a treasure chest prize pool:
i18n_text8: 3.Only when family members receive 100 charm in their own family room can open the treasure chest.
i18n_text9: 4.Charm value statistics from 21:00:00-20:59:59 of the day.
i18n_text11: 6.Don't use illegal means to obtain rewards, otherwise you will be officially banned.

i18n_box_open_no5: Members of the top 5 families on the daily rank can receive rewards
i18n_box_open_time: The charm value rank ends at 21:00 every day (GMT+7)

i18n_box_bootom2: Become a family member and participate in activities to receive rewards
